website_summaries.verdict: An expertly constructed and environmentally friendly hand dryer.
pros: Automatically shuts itself off when not in use
cons: Noisy hand dryer may be problematic in an office space

customer_reviews.title: Great dryer
customer_reviews.text: Compact but very powerful. Not that noisy, can't hear much from outside of bathrooms, and helps with the mess people make with disposable paper towels all over the floors instead of in the trash can.
customer_reviews.author: Read Trek

customer_reviews.title: Great dryer for price
customer_reviews.text: Little loud but most dryers are. Great strength and good form factor. No plug, unit is made to be wired to electricity.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it's ability to "getter done" but I wish it ...
customer_reviews.text: Power, power, power. Love it's ability to "getter done" but I wish it could be a little quieter. Guess you can't have it all and it's worth the noise to have something that actually works!
customer_reviews.author: JEllis54

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This hand dryer works great! I wouldn't go without it. It has saved us a lot from using paper towels and all of the garbage that goes with!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Friemoth

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful hand dryer. It looks great, works well, and installed really easily.
customer_reviews.author: Phil D'Grave

customer_reviews.title: Works great and dries your hand quickly
customer_reviews.text: I own a restaurant and have one of these units in both the men's and ladies room.. Works great and dries your hand quickly!
customer_reviews.author: alexandria solt

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love it, its a little loud but it works great, drys fast and powerful worm air
customer_reviews.author: izyBeats

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Effectively dries hands but too noisy for a small office. Will have to replace with a quieter unit.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Shedden

customer_reviews.title: ... a beta test dryer to see if it performs better than the Xlerator style that we currently have on ...
customer_reviews.text: The Blue Storm was a beta test dryer to see if it performs better than the Xlerator style that we currently have on campus. Currently under review.
customer_reviews.author: John E Jawor

customer_reviews.title: blue storm high speed hand dryer ...........
customer_reviews.text: this are very good product. easy to install. and easy to use. I recomend this hand dryer to any bussines. thanks.
customer_reviews.author: silvia

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Definately worth the money....Excellent! this is just as good as the expensive hand dryers. Recommend to any company looking to go-green,
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Novick

customer_reviews.title: You won't go wrong with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: These Machines are the best! Installed 2 a month ago warm air and high power. They work great.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Glennon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great hand dryer, our company is saving a lot of money by moving away from papertowels
customer_reviews.author: Adam S

customer_reviews.title: The air dryer itself is really good and gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: I received a broken unit right out the box, but I returned it and got a replacement in a timely fashion. The air dryer itself is really good and gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Saif Abu-Anbar

customer_reviews.title: Eliminates the need for paper towels
customer_reviews.text: Super fast drying time. I put one in every restroom .
customer_reviews.author: Scott Slavik

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. Cheaper then other brands but does the same job. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: OB

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend this hand dryer!
customer_reviews.text: This hand dryer has all the features we were looking for! Price is right and with a 5 year warranty and the quick dry time - this dryer puts Dyson to shame!
customer_reviews.author: Ironman0419

product_meta.title: Blue Storm High Speed Hand Dryer by Palmer Fixture
product_meta.description: The Blue Storm (BluStorm) Hand Dryer by Palmer Fixture is a high speed hand dryer with a unique design offering a blue light to help with energy efficient hand drying. The BluStorm hand dryer can save you thousands of dollars a year in paper towel and electricity. The Blue Storm hand dryer is GreenSpec listed. Products selected for the GreenSpec list are considered to be the top of class and environmentally preferable, based on USGBC Building Green's criteria. The BluStorm hand dryer can help earn LEED credits based on EA Credit 1 for optimized energy performance. The BluStorm costs about .0004 cents per use to operate.
feature_bullets: Saves energy by automatically shutting itself off
